title: Fusilli: A Python package housing a collection of deep-learning multi-modal data fusion method pipelines!
authors: Florence J Townend, James Chapman, and James H Cole
teaser: Introducing Fusilli, an innovative Python package for multi-modal data fusion in deep learning.

title: CCA-Zoo: A collection of Regularized, Deep Learning based, Kernel, and Probabilistic CCA methods in a scikit-learn style framework
teaser: CCA-Zoo: A comprehensive toolkit bridging the gap in multimodal machine learning.
